highlights:
Qualifications:
 Bachelor’s Degree required from a 4 year accredited institution, Extensive background in the educational market, Proven track record of managing complex district or client partnerships to include impactful program adoptions, effective implementations and ongoing engagement, Excellent communication skills and successful experience with group presentations, Ability to work and collaborate in office or remotely and the ability to travel as needed, Demonstrated desire for continuous learning and improvement, Demonstrated success as a top performer, meeting or exceeding goals including new customers and/or partnerships, Enthusiastic with the ability to inspire others, Ability to stand, walk, sit, use hands, reach with hands and arms, speak and hear; may occasionally be asked to lift up to 15 pounds, Normal physical mobility that includes movement from place to place, Ability to sit for long periods of time, 
Responsibilities:
 This position is responsible for proactive client acquisition, management of strategic relationships, and development of territories and achievement of sales goals, Conduct a high volume of outbound cold calls to potential clients to successfully book meetings;, Create and maintain a pipeline of prospects and client information;, Present and provide information and conduct follow up calls;, Research and produce potential leads;, Possess an in depth knowledge of HeyTutor and ability to communicate that to the client;, Manage the Sales Development Representatives;, Generating sales within the assigned region (region assignment is subject to change by the CRO);, Drive sales and adoption of learning committees for programs through strategic planning and implementation;, Establish industry expertise and develop multi-level relationships through consultations, presentations, trainings, and webinars based on strong learning market knowledge;, Lead district program rollout, training and ongoing relationship support to ensure program usage and build enduring partnerships;, Achieve or exceed quarterly and annual revenue goals through new and renewal sales;, Actively represent organization at conferences and events to promote awareness and build relationships with strategic partners and clients;, Collaborate effectively with internal teams including educational partnerships, client success and support implementation and others to ensure proactive client support;, Forecast and manage pipeline activity for accurate account planning; and, Maintain accurate and well documented spreadsheets, including reporting
